import {useState} from 'react' import ButtonForm from '../form/buttonForm' import Input from '../form/input' import Select from '../form/select' function FormAccount({handleSubmit, txtBtn}){ const [newPass, setNewPass] = useState([]) function OnChangePass(e) { setNewPass({...newPass,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (
) } export default FormAccount
